content: knitted pot-holders with nordic pattern in drops belle theme christmas drops design pattern no vs-080 yarn group b **size** approx 21 x 20 cm **materials** drops belle from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100 g colour 03 light beige 100 g colour 10 moss green 1 pot-holder weighs approx 64 g needles drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm **knitting gauge ** 23 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm
